Date: Monday, 6/23/1978
Subject: Progress of Manny Seoane
Dear Sir,
Manny Seoane is doing pretty good at A Tampa Tarpons!
He has an ERA of 0.42, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 6/23/1978
Subject: Progress of Duane Theiss
Dear Sir,
Duane Theiss has nothing more to prove at AA Nashville Sounds!
He has an ERA of 2.03 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
